title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Pre-requisites: EC31005Lumped circuit elements at high frequencies. S-matrix representation. RF components design: Power splitters/combiners, directional couplers, hybrids, impedance and balun transformers. RF Filter design. RF mixers, RF amplifier and Oscillator design. Amplifier Noise figure and Oscillator Phase noise. .RF instruments and measurement techniques. RF subsystem design.
